content.rendered:
Jointly developed with LaSalle Investment Management, the integrated development will comprise retail and serviced residences. Ascott Ltd has been awarded the contract to manage the serviced residence of the development and it will be named Citadines Rochor Singapore.

Sitting on the doorstep of Singapore’s vibrant Little India precinct and the fringe of the Central Business District, the integrated development is easily accessible via North East and Downtown MRT Lines, with the Little India, Rochor, and the newly-opened Jalan Besar Stations, all within walking distance.

For more information visit http://tekkaplace.sg/
